discourse_list.title: Offboarding MIP7c3-SP6 Domain Team Mandated Actor

content.content: This notice is to announce the resignation of Mandated Actor Sam MacPherson (@hexonaut) as smart contract domain team member in his role as Mandated Actor with immediate effect. This post will effectively nullify MIP7c3-SP6, proposed on 2020-12-08 and ratified on 2021-01-30. The MIP7 process for onboarding Mandated Actors via domain teams was superceded by the Core Unit model and it is my position that the MIP7 model is now obsolete. I will continue to operate in my role as contributors and advisors to the Protocol Engineering Core Unit under Facilitator Derek Flossman.
This topic was automatically closed 91 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
